headline: United States Postal Service Recognizes Zebra Technologies with Supplier Performance Award
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., June 19, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation, a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today announced the United States Postal Service (USPS) presented the company with a Supplier Performance Award for being critical to the success of Postal Service operations and services.
